profile.name: ISO 19005-2:2011 - 6.4 Interactive forms - 6.4.1 General - Form field actions
profile.description: A Widget annotation dictionary or Field dictionary shall not contain the A or AA keys.
profile.creator: veraPDF Consortium

rule.description: A Widget annotation dictionary or Field dictionary shall not contain the A or AA keys.

error.message: A Form field dictionary contains the AA entry
